e="preserve">Dragoljub Ojdanić (; 1 June 1941 – 6 September 2020) was a Serbian military official. He was the Chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Yugoslavia between 1998 to 2000 and Minister of Defence of Yugoslavia in 2000.
He was convicted of deportation and forcible transfer of Kosovo Albanians during the Kosovo War by the ICTY.
Ojdanić died on 6 September 2020 in Belgrade, aged 79.
